channel.title: Comments on: XPages training videos now available on the iPad

item.title: By: Matt White
item.dc:creator: Matt White
item.description: <p>Hi Thimo,</p><p>I did investigate that, unfortunately you're not allowed to put password protected podcasts into iTunes so I can't do anything for the moment. As soon as that changes I will make it available though.</p><p>Matt</p>
item.content:encoded:
Hi Thimo,

I did investigate that, unfortunately you're not allowed to put password protected podcasts into iTunes so I can't do anything for the moment. As soon as that changes I will make it available though.

Matt

item.title: By: Thimo Jansen
item.dc:creator: Thimo Jansen
item.description: <p>VERY nice, thanks. It's great to be able to view the video's on the iPad.</p><p>Now, prob. pushing the boundaries here, would it be possible to have the video's appear in an iTunes podcast list?</p>
item.content:encoded:
VERY nice, thanks. It's great to be able to view the video's on the iPad.

Now, prob. pushing the boundaries here, would it be possible to have the video's appear in an iTunes podcast list?
